title: Vegehop
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Macrobiotic, Western, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Croatian
description: A club restaurant offering Zagreb vegan cuisine, with a touch of macrobiotics, made from non GMO ingredients. The daily menu is vegan. Has moussakas, lasagnas, tortillas, pastas, salads, juice, coffee, tea, and desserts. Has raw and gluten-free items. No alcohol. Located 10-minute walk from Ban Jelacic square, follow the Vlaska street to the east.
